title: Up In The Air Movie Font
content:
Seems like the newer "Up In The Air" trailers are going with a new font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120104164223im_/http:/typophile.com/files/UpInTheAir_4970.png)

Anyone know what it is? Thanks!
author: indie_uxyz

comments.content:
Hi Andrew,

that looks like [Calibri](http://web.archive.org/web/20120104164223/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/case-studies/calibri-consolas/).  
F
Is it fair to say that any new movie from Hollywood with a huge budget will inevitably be using a free or system font for most of its marketing?
